Amon Hotep

crown (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 193
armor id [armor]: 212 (Magic Crown)
protection, head [prothead]: 9
magic resistance [mr]: +5
resist fire [fireres]: +15
spell [itemspell]: #32 Mummification
awe [awe]: +5
invulnerability [invulnerable]: 25
(unremovable [cursed], crown [crown])

Requires 40F25S to forge (F5S4)

This golden headgear contains the soul of Amon Hotep, the First Mummy. The power of Amon Hotep gives its wearer protection from both physical and mental harm. Amon Hotep's skill in mummification enables the headgear's wearer to create mummies at will.
